downloaded_file_themes.principle: No Magic Numbers - All parameters in Config Schema (Pydantic/Hydra)
Logic flows; State is carried - Stateless pure functions like JAX

downloaded_file_themes.principle: The Notebook is the Paper - Using Quarto for executable documentation
Environment as binary - Strict dependency management via pyproject.toml and justfile
Code for the Machine - Type hints mandatory, docstrings required

downloaded_file_decisions.statement: All entry points must accept typed Config object (Pydantic/Dataclass)
downloaded_file_decisions.consequence: Enables reproducibility and AI-assisted code generation

downloaded_file_decisions.statement: Separate Logic (pure functions) from State (passed as arguments)
Notebook IS the paper - executable documentation via Quarto
downloaded_file_decisions.consequence: Documentation cannot drift from reality; automatic validation

downloaded_file_decisions.statement: Environment locked in pyproject.toml + justfile, treat as binary
downloaded_file_decisions.consequence: 2028 researcher can run 'just run-experiment' and get identical results

downloaded_file_decisions.statement: Type hints mandatory, docstrings required, .context.md for architecture
downloaded_file_decisions.consequence: AI assistants (Cursor, Copilot) become first-class collaborators

local_infrafabric_decisions.statement: 3-tier session handover to prevent context exhaustion
local_infrafabric_decisions.consequence: Sustainable long-term research with token efficiency

local_infrafabric_decisions.statement: IF.TTT mandatory for all agent operations - Traceable, Transparent, Trustworthy
All citations use if:// URI scheme with state tracking
local_infrafabric_decisions.consequence: Cryptographic proof of claim origin and status evolution

downloaded_manifesto_rules.title: The Commit Checklist - TRIAD
requirements: Reproducible: Test case or notebook entry proves it works

downloaded_manifesto_rules.title: All commands in justfile, not README
State passed explicitly, never in self

local_infrafabric_rules.title: IF.TTT Mandatory for All Operations
requirements: Every claim links to observable source (file:line, git commit, citation)
Status tracking: unverified ‚Üí verified ‚Üí disputed ‚Üí revoked

local_infrafabric_rules.title: All IF.* components require if:// URIs
requirements: 11 resource types: agent, citation, claim, conversation, decision, did, doc, improvement, test-run, topic, vault
MD5 hash verification for component identity

local_infrafabric_rules.title: Task Delegation to Haiku Agents
requirements: Delegate mechanical tasks: file updates, installations, data transforms, git ops
Use Sonnet for complex reasoning and council deliberations
Spawn parallel Haiku agents for independent tasks

local_infrafabric_rules.title: Component Implementation Status Tracking
categories: ‚úÖ IMPLEMENTED (29%): IF.yologuard, IF.search, IF.philosophy, IF.ground, IF.persona
Planned (29%): IF.guard, IF.ceo, IF.swarm, IF.arbitrate, IF.vesicle

synthesis.description: The downloaded manifesto provides the coding/technical foundation (WHAT and HOW), while local InfraFabric documentation extends it to organizational/research governance (WHY and WHO). They are not contradictory but represent different abstraction layers.
synthesis.manifesto_level: Macro - Software engineering principles for research reproducibility
synthesis.infrafabric_level: Micro - Specific implementations and components, plus Macro' governance structure
synthesis.integration_opportunity: Downloaded manifesto rules (TRIAD, Config Schema, Functional Core) should be embedded into InfraFabric's IF.* component checklist. IF.yologuard, IF.search, and IF.ground should be examples of 'Perfect Module Pattern' from manifesto.

metadata.research_depth: Deep - 15 months of consolidation into 4D universe model
metadata.notes: The downloaded manifesto appears to be a technical foundation document written BEFORE the local InfraFabric project's full governance structure was developed. It represents 'first principles' while local documentation represents 'operating principles' at scale.
